PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-05752019-05-21,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Security Regulations, 2012 (Air Cargo and Mail Provisions)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION SECURITY REGULATIONS, 2012 (AIR CARGO AND MAIL PROVISIONS) in order to maintain a secure and efficient air cargo and mail system. These amendments will result in greater transparency to stakeholders and the aviation industry, and will help align the Canadian regulatory framework with international standards.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0149 Publication Date: 2019-05-29
AttachmentsAttachment
